{{Description|Hu Tao's Secret Spear technique is based on several rules, the first of which is: "The spear opens the path to the afterlife, and the butterflies bridge this world and the next."}}
'''Guide to Afterlife''' is [[Hu Tao]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|a converted attack|2.5}}
** This particle generation has a cooldown of ~5 seconds.
** Therefore, it can generate a total of '''4–6''' [[Elemental Particle]]s through its whole duration.
** Converted [[Plunging Attack]]s do not generate particles.
* While the Paramita Papilio state is active, Hu Tao does not step back before charging forward. This makes her Charged Attacks under this state faster and travel further from her starting position.<!-- distance covered may be the same as measured from the start of each CA, but the distance covered is 100% in front of her starting position in the state instead of also covering distance behind her starting position -->
* This skill's activation produces a damageless [[0U]] {{Pyro}} attack around Hu Tao.
* No HP will be consumed if Hu Tao has exactly 1 HP left when activating the skill.
* The Paramita Papilio State does not expire during the animation of a Charged Attack.
